snippet: The pork producer’s net income fell to 49 cents a share from 59 cents a share last year.
abstract: Smithfield Foods reports fiscal fourth-quarter profit of $79.5 million, or 49 cents a share, down 19 percent from $98.4 million, or 59 cents a share, in year-ago quarter; revenue rose 3 percent to $3.21 billion from $3.12 billion.
lead_paragraph: The pork producer’s net income fell to 49 cents a share from 59 cents a share last year.

headline.seo: Smithfield Foods’ Profit Falls on Lower Margins for Pork
headline.main: Smithfield Foods’ Profit Drops on Lower Margins for Pork
headline.print_headline: Smithfield Foods’ Profit Drops on Lower Margins for Pork
